metadata.title: Domot
metadata.summary: We dey give una latest tori on top politics, environment, business, sports, entertainment, health, fashion and all di oda things wey dey happen for West and Central Africa come add di rest of di world join. For better informate plus explanation of all di ogbonge tori wey pipo never hear about for inside West and Central Africa, BBC Pidgin dey serve am with video, audio, maps and oda graphics join.

headlines.headline: Akwa Ibom pipo dey enjoy dog meat

items.summary: Dis food be one of di ogbonge delicacy wey pipo for Akwa Ibom dey enjoy.

media.title: Akwa Ibom pipo dey enjoy dog meat

synopses.short: Dog Meat: Di food treat wey Akwa Ibomites dey enjoy
synopses.long:
For different parts of Nigeria, pipo get di kind food wey dem dey chop wey dey special to them and for Akwa Ibom, dog meat na one of di ogbonge food wey pipo dey chop for di town.
Some pipo dey  chop am alone with palm wine and odas fit use garri or pounded yam enjoy am.
Dem also tok say di meat dey help sick pipo and e dey good for sex.
synopses.medium: Dis food be one of di ogbonge delicacy wey pipo for Akwa Ibom dey enjoy.

media.caption: Dog Meat: Di food treat wey Akwa Ibomites dey enjoy

indexImage.altText: Our Akwa Ibom pipo dey enjoy dog meat

headlines.headline: 'I no fit trust any nanny again'

items.summary: Afta 14 years experience, dis Lagos banker decide say she no fit completely trust any nanny again.

media.title: 'I no fit trust any nanny agai'

synopses.short: Nanny Dairies: 'I no fit trust any nanny agai'
synopses.long:
Her 14 years experience wit different nannies don make dis Lagos banker decide say she no fit completely trust any nanny again.

Nannies don become part many family lives for Nigeria and oda parts of di world, especially for working mamas and papas.

" I don have one wen I trust so much , truly e be like family, if my family come we go hug, greet like we all na di same. And dis one take all di keys for my box, my house, my room, make im own copy."

"So if I comot tink say I don lock my house, im go bring out im keys, go, take wetin im want, lock am back. So if I come back I go dey wonder say haha... I lock dis place? abi I lose money?" Ann Oragu tell BBC News Pidgin.

No laws dey wey dey directly protect nannies or oda domestic staff inside Nigeria, according to experts.

And na sao cases of abuse dey common among those wey dey use pikin dem as house help, nanny or domestic staff. 
 
For di past four years, Child Care Psychologist, Pamela Akinboye wey dey train nannies for years say she and her team don  record a yearly request of at least 1000 enquiries for nannies inside Lagos alone. 

Di reason be say more homes inside Lagos get just mama and papa and pikin as family members and both parents dey work, so paid support dey necessary but issue of trust and fear dey di mind of di parents, according to Pamela Akinboboye.

Types of Nanny

 "Nannies dey different from house keeper" 
Dooler or Maternity nanny, General nanny, Governess, Special needs nanny na some of di categories of different nannies wey pipo dey confuse at different stages to be di same, and na dis mata make me decide to begin support women wey get fears about leaving dia homes in di hands of nannies, according to Pamela Akinboye.

"Our focus (for Icarella Childcare Services) na knowledge based child care, we want make nannnies dey care for children and engage dem in structured way; saftey for children, nutrition for children, Hygen for children and how dem go translate dat knowledge to child care"  

As e be say in many modern homes both parents dey work, Pamela tell BBC Pidgin say high demand for domestic support like nannies dey. 


'Nannies dey see tins'
 
Lady Gold na nanny wey don see days and she believe say na di way most families dey treat dia nannies na make dis issue of trust dey."I don work for di one wey go spoil you wit money, but everi day you go cry"
Experts dey advice pipo wey get issues wit nannies to put dia children for crèche. For Icarella Childcare Services dem dey work wit complete legal documents wey dey clearly define di roles of all parties (both di nanny and di employer of di nanny) wey dey involved and protects against abuse. 

Di fear of being on di wrong side of di law go put everyone in check, according to Pamela.

Producer: Daniel Semeniworima
Video: Ufuoma Gift
synopses.medium: Her 14 years experience wit different nannies don make dis Lagos banker decide say she no fit completely trust any nanny again.

media.caption: Producer: Daniel Semeniworima, Video: Ufuoma Gift

media.title: “I heal people wen I play di Saxophone”

synopses.short: Temilayo Abodunrin: Nine year old girl wey dey heal pipo wit her saxophone
synopses.long:
Temilayo Abodunrin na nine-year-old Nigerian girl wey dey perform wonders wit di saxophone.
She don perform wit artistes like Johnny Drille, collect accolade from music producer, Don Jazzy and entertain pipo for Tedx stage inside Nigeria.

To dey play saxophone na di best tin wey Temilayo don dey do since wen she dey six-years-old.

Producers: Sarah Tiamiyu and Ogechi Obidiebube

headlines.headline: Exclusive: Why I no want pipo to vote on February 16 - Nnamdi Kanu

items.summary: Di leader of di Indigenous People of Biafra, Nnamdi Kanu, tell BBC say im want make Nigeria goment know say im dem dey serious wit di call for Biafra.

media.title: Exclusive: Why I no want pipo to vote on February 16 - Nnamdi Kanu

synopses.short: Nnamdi Kanu: 'Why I no want pipo to vote on February 16'
synopses.long:
Oga of di Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu don tell BBC why e no want make im pipo participate for di 2019 elections for Nigeria.
Inside exclusive interview wey im do wit BBC Igbo, im open mouth about plenti tins, including im proof say Nigeria president Muhammadu Buhari and im opposition Atiku Abubakar no be from Nigerians, plus how im manage escape Nigeria under di nose of military pipo,
synopses.medium: Di leader of di Independent People of Biafra, Nnamdi Kanu, tell BBC say im want make Nigeria goment know say im dem dey serious wit di call for Biafra.

media.caption: Nnamdi Kanu: 'Why I no want pipo to vote on February 16'

headlines.headline: EXCLUSIVE: "Atiku beta pass Buhari two times" #BBCNigeria2019

items.summary: Former president Olusegun Obasanjo don explain give BBC why im dey support Atiku Abubakar ahead of February general elections.

media.title: Day 25: 'Why I forgive Atiku' #BBCNigeria2019

synopses.short: Nigeria 2019 Elections: Why I forgive Atiku - Olusegun Obasanjo
synopses.medium: Former president Olusegun Obasanjo don explain give BBC why im decide to forgive Atiku Abubakar ahead of February general elections.
synopses.long:
Former president Olusegun Obasanjo don explain give BBC News Pidgin why im decide to forgive di main opposition presidential candidate Atiku Abubakar ahead of di 16 February general elections for Nigeria.

'Di choice we get for Nigeria situation today and I dey tok about 2019 na betwwen di candidates of APC party and di candidate of PDP party di odas na minor-minor party wey go line behind dem'

"So if APC bring Buhari and PDP bring Atiku and from wetin I sabi about Buhari... and wetin im don do e show say im no sabi di work, e dey do partial, im dey evil and dey do anyhow even for corruption."

"Evritin about Buhari, I believe say Atiku beta pass Buhari times two" Obasanjo tok.

Already President Muhammadu Buhari on Monday come out say na jealousy dey worry Obasanjo.

media.caption: Nigeria 2019 Elections: Why I forgive Atiku - Olusegun Obasanjo

headlines.headline: Day 23: 'Who be Obasanjo to say Atiku beta pass Buhari?' #BBCNigeria2019

items.summary: Di tok -tok pesin for Nigeria president Muhammadu Buhari Campaign organisation, Festus Keyamo dey react to wetin former presido Olusegun Obasanjo tok say Atiku Abubakar beta pass Buhari two times.

media.title: Day 23: 'Who be Obasanjo to say Atiku beta pass Buhari?' #BBCNigeria2019

synopses.short: Olusegun Obasanjo: Who be OBJ to say Atiku beta pass Buhari? - Keyamo
synopses.long:
Tok-tok pesin for Nigeria president Muhammadu Buhari Campaign Organisation Festus Keyamo say anybody wey tink say di presido head no correct need to go check im own head.

Keyamo tell BBC Pidgin say di presido get im own pattern wey e dey use make im point wen e dey tok.

According to Keyamo, pipo wey dey yab president Buhari because e no go debate dey waste dia time.
E say leadership quality no be debating skills and dat di platform wey Nigeria Election Debate Group create no di suitable for di incumbent to tok dia mind.

Keyamo also chook mouth ontop di 16 page letter wey former President Olusegun Obasanjo write about di elections and Buhari goment tok say just be like tissue paper.
Keyano tok say E say di president dey gidigba and e dey fresh everyday dey do im campaign across di kontri.
synopses.medium: Di tok -tok pesin for Nigeria president Muhammadu Buhari Campaign organisation, Festus Keyamo dey react to accusation against di president by former presido Olusegun Obasanjo say B

media.caption: Olusegun Obasanjo: Who be OBJ to say Atiku beta pass Buhari? - Keyamo

headlines.headline: Day 27: 'As Commander-in-chief my special force go comot confidence from terrorist hand' #BBCNigeria2019

items.summary: Obiageli Ezekwesili dey contest di seat of president for Nigeria 2019 elections, she bin don hold two ogbonge position for di kontri as minister of Education and Solid minerals.

media.title: Day 27:  As Commander-in-chief my special force go comot confidence from terrorist dia hand - Ezekwesili #BBCNigeria2019

synopses.short: Nigeria 2019 elections: I go comot confidence from terrorist hand wen I win - Ezekwesili
synopses.long:
Presidential candidate under di new political party - Allied Congress Party of Nigeria Oby Ezekwesili tell BBC say 
she dey run for goment to lead di citizens of Nigeria  on a journey to rescue di kontri from di political class wey don lead di kontri go back.

Di former mister of Education and Solid minerals don dey road dey campaign since 2014 for goment to bring back di school girls wey boko haram militants dem kidnap from Chibok, Borno state.
She tell BBC say wen she become di Commander-in-chief of di armed forces, she go set up a special force team, 
Chibok Special Force to make sure say any group wey dey carry out terrorist operation no go get mind, dey comfortable for di kontri.
She also believe say plenti Nigerians believe trust am dem say she dey run for presidency to move di kontri forward.
synopses.medium: Obiageli Ezekwesili dey contest di seat of president for Nigeria 2019 elections, she bin don hold two ogbonge position for di kontri as minister of Education and Solid minerals.

media.caption: Nigeria 2019 elections: I go comot confidence from terrorist hand wen I win - Ezekwesili

indexImage.altText: Oby Ezekwesili na Nigeria presidential candidate

synopses.short: BBC Pidgin Akwa Ibom debate: I don get candidate for mind now wey I go vote for - Resident
synopses.long: Pipo wey come di BBC Pidgin Debate for Akwa Ibom State don speak dia mind about di event. For dem, e provide way for dem to tok wit dia Governorship candidates and to engage dem on mata wey close to dia mind.
synopses.medium: Four governorship candidates for Akwa-Ibom state South South Nigeria ansa qweshion ontop different issues including di Economy, Environment and Education.

media.caption: BBC Pidgin Akwa Ibom debate: I don get candidate for mind now wey I go vote for - Resident
